hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select uuid as uuid, entries_inheriting as entriesInheriting, object_id_identity as objectIdIdentity, object_id_class as objectIdClass, parent_object as parentObject, owner_sid as ownerSid, create_time as createTime, creator as creator, modify_time as modifyTime, modifier as modifier, rec_ver as recVer from acl_object_identity t where t.object_id_identity = :objectIdIdentity

select t.uuid as uuid, t.granting as granting, t.mask as mask, t.acl_object_identity as aclObjectIdentity, t.sid as sid, t.object_id_identity as objectIdIdentity, create_time as createTime, creator as creator, modify_time as modifyTime, modifier as modifier, rec_ver as recVer from acl_entry t where t.object_id_identity = :objectIdIdentity
